content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Baihu Li, it's great to meet you. Thank you for your interest in renting my apartment. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I was thinking a rental price of 800 Euros per month would be fair. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month. Can we sign the contract tomorrow?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Great to hear that you agree to the rental price of 800 Euros per month. Yes, we can sign the contract tomorrow. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns before then.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
TERMINATE. Thank you for your time.
I am Baihu Li from China. I have been studying in Germany for the past year and I am looking for a new apartment to rent. I have been offered an apartment in Mannheim and I would like to negotiate the rental price. Can you please provide me with the details of the apartment and the rental price?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Sure, Baihu Li. The apartment I am offering is 25 square meters and is located in the center of Mannheim. The rental price I am thinking of is 800 Euros per month. Please let me know if you would like to negotiate this price.
name: Heinrich Heine
